Text:
You can only use this software, when you are not connected to the internet, otherwise you'll get this message:
"We are very sorry for the inconvenience, you may be victim of software piracy, please purchase the genuine software, thank you"

To fix this issue go into Windows firewall and block outgoing connection from the application "windows8manager.exe" in the yamicsoft folder.
I installed this and it's really 1.06 which is what I already had. It seemed to update OK and overwrote the existing version. Has anyone installed this and got 1.07?
